hero.name: Oğuzhan Evin
hero.title: Creative thinker Minimalism lover
hero.description: Hi, I’m Oğuzhan Evin. I’m a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who can craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences, let’s shake hands with me.

items.name: JavaScript
items.description: I took JavaScript courses, I still take HackerRank exams, and keep my JavaScript knowledge up to date.

items.name: React.Js
items.description: I took React courses and I am completing my projects. If you are curious, I leave a link to a pizza project: https://pizza-theta-murex.vercel.app/.

items.name: Python
items.description: I completed Python courses in ITU's data science training in 2023.

items.label: Educational background
items.value: TOBB University Bachelor's degree in Industrial Engineering, 2024

aboutMe.title: About Me
descriptions: I am an industrial engineer who wants to be a software developer. If I talk about myself, I am a funny, ordinary person who loves sports.

items.title: Workintech
items.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS, and Parcel Bundler and is available as an NPM package. The Git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.

items.title: Random Jokes
items.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS, and Parcel Bundler and is available as an NPM package. The Git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.

items.title: Journey
items.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS, and Parcel Bundler and is available as an NPM package. The Git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.

footer.title: Let’s work together on your next product.

hero.name: Oğuzhan Evin
hero.title: Yaratıcı fikirler Minimalist çözümler
hero.description: Merhaba, Ben Oğuzhan Evin. Full-stack geliştiriciyim. Sağlam ve ölçeklenebilir front-end ürünleriyle harika kullanıcı deneyimleri yaratmak istiyorsanız, tanışalım mı?

items.name: JavaScript
items.description: JavaScript dersleri aldım, halen HackerRank sınavlarına giriyorum ve JavaScript bilgilerimi güncel tutuyorum.

items.name: React.Js
items.description: React derslerini aldım ve projelerimi tamamlıyorum. Merak ediyorsanız bir pizza projesinin linkini bırakıyorum: https://pizza-theta-murex.vercel.app/.

items.name: Python
items.description: İTÜ veri bilimi eğitiminde Python kurslarını 2023 yılında tamamladım.

aboutMe.title: Hakkımda
descriptions: Yazılımcı olmak isteyen bir endüstri mühendisiyim. Kendimden bahsedecek olursam, sporu seven, komik, sıradan bir insanım.

items.title: Workintech
items.description: Kullanıcılarınızın hangi çerezleri kabul edeceğini veya reddedeceğini seçmesine olanak tanıyan basit, özelleştirilebilir, minimal kurulumlu bir çerez eklentisi. Bu, vanilya JS, SCSS ve Parcel Bundler ile oluşturulmuştur ve bir NPM paketi olarak mevcuttur. Git deposu, kod ve temalarda her türlü özelleştirmeyi mümkün kılar.
